content.description: This fun climb has the crux at the large ledge just below the top out.  Some opportunity for stemming, but mostly a face climb.
content.protection: 2 bolts at the top plus a third bolt if desired.
content.location:
The route is located to the right of the northernmost point of the large rock that is adjacent to the large rock with the boulder balanced on top.

To access the bolts, you need to climb up to the boulder that is the highest point in the Indian Joe Cave area.  Then jump over "Hour Glass" (the climb up the chimney from below)to the adjacent large boulder to reach the bolts to set up your anchor.
